name: focus-mode
description: Focus mode for Spotify - show only album art with player controls on mouse move

scripts.deploy: npm run copy && spicetify config extensions focus-mode.js && spicetify apply && spicetify enable-devtools
scripts.deploy-dist: npm run build && npm run copy-dist && spicetify config extensions focus-mode.js && spicetify apply
scripts.local: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.undeploy: rm -rf `spicetify path userdata`/Extensions/focus-mode.js && spicetify config extensions focus-mode.js- && spicetify apply
